review:
Good product. Comfortable to use

The product is good.

Dell never fails in their products... Amazing and cool looking mouse... Really
awesome... Smooth.. cam role on any surface... Buttons are smooth...

My Dell MS11 had suddenly stopped after using it for 3 yrs , so i had surfed
the internet for budget mouse and found this one .After using it for couple of
weeks i had found it that it works perfectly and the accuracy of movement is
also good ,i had use it in editing software like Aobe Premier Pro and i worked
perfectly like a champ.I will recommend it for the user's who wants it for
daily usage and for serious gamers don't opt for this instead go for logitech
or something else as this is for daily usage and the its not that accurate in
games like other gamer mouse does it. Coming to after sales service ,it comes
with one year warranty,and dell service is very good in terms of accessories
so you blindly go for it incase you are not pro gamers.

Very small mouse but this is better(and bigger) than those tiny local laptop
mouses of cheaper brands like quantum or portronics.  
U wont find a mouse like this at this price.  
The click and wheel could have a little more weight to them, they feel very
lightweight and easy to press by accident. the clicks are not separate and are
integrated with the top body, that combined with smaller size means u will
accidently click it even with your palm/  
  
But again when u compare this with others at this price point, this is much
better than the competition. Logitech makes some mouses that are larger but
they cost around 700 rupees.

I am using dell product for first time and i have to say that the product is
very awesome. It was right on time even sooner than expected. I am very
satisfied with dell mouse. I will definitely recommend dell mouse. If you are
looking for an external mouse for your laptop definately go for it. Thanks for
fast delivery Amazon. Totally recommend this product.

The most Amazing Mouse Ever seen  
The Dell Optical Mouse – MS116 features optical LED tracking and wired
connectivity providing a stellar performance day after day. Improve your
productivity at the office or at home–the Dell Optical Mouse.  
  
Compatible with practically any system  
Plug and play convenience  
At home or in the office

Ergonomic design that can help you to stay in natural position and cause less
stress even if you use it for hours of working/playing.  
Smooth Texture finish with nice quality of wire.  
Perfect to buy in this range.  
Cheers!!

Better than any other.

The mouse I received has a very short / thin cable and with a sub-standard USB
plug. I compared with the same product a friend of my bought from another
source. I am not sure if its a product problem or a seller duplicate!

The plastic material is of very inferior quality. Received it with its parts
open even when it was packed very well. Had to fix it by pressing. But was
worried if pressing both sides would damage the weak plastic parts. It works
perfectly fine.

Awesome and smooth mouse

The wire cable is not so good as expected. The cable is not lengthy too - not
so good for desktop use. The mouse does not work on smooth surface - you need
a mouse pad - for proper working.

Geniune product..little high priced though

perfect buy for me. Still working perfectly months after purchase.

out and try again, and it should work just fine.

improved a bit on that part.

review:
I recieved a duplicate product, mouse doesn't work on clear white table
surface, it only works on mouse pad. I bought it after I was impressed by same
mouse which my colleague bought. I was on a long holiday when the product was
delivered hence couldn't request replacement before the time window closed.
Currently I'm living with it. Finally a FAKE PRODUCT THROUGH AMAZON

I didn't buy this from Amazon but from a local store in my town. Got it for
265.00 and it is original. I had only one day with it and hope it will last
for few months. Actually, I regret buying this because, compared to my
previous Microsoft mouse, this is so poor in quality and performance. The
clicks are so hard and it feels terrible. I need to press hard to register a
click and it feels stressful! What can you expect from 265.00 rupees mouse
after all? Should have gone for something expensive.

Value for money; superb quality; good precision and dpi at this cost; Grip is
firm;

Wonderful seller; genuine product; original with the serial number and some
dell scratch card with original authentication number; it's a good buy; value
for money and would recommend to all the buyers

Sold me duplicate product. Extremely cheap plastic mouse. Original from Dell
is good.

Size, weight, wheel, clicking sound everything is perfect. Very good quality
products.

It is really a good device & right it is working very well

not good. not smooth. wasted my money

Receive the product on 22nd of September and the left click is not working
properly now today is 17th December and I am having trouble with the mouse.
Not even completed 3 months, not expected from the reputed brands like Dell. I
had already given 5 star for the mouse but now I am giving only star as I had
face the problem right now. Though it has warranty of 3 years as the seller
has described but I have to take it to the service centre and I don't know how
much time it will take to repair or replace I don't even know whether they are
going to repair or replace.

Very poor quality
